question: Which number is composite and has more than three factors?

options: The product of the two prime numbers

question: Which of the following pairs of numbers has the same highest common factor (HCF) as 24 and 36?
Which of the following pairs has the same HCF as 15 and 20?
A gym instructor has 24 yoga mats and 36 dumbbells. She wants to divide them into the same number of groups with equal quantities of both items. What is the largest number of groups she can make?
A teacher has 45 math books and 60 science books. She wants to arrange them into stacks with the same number of books in each stack. What is the largest number of stacks she can make?

Three friends have 90 marbles, 120 marbles, and 150 marbles, respectively. They want to divide all their marbles into bags, each containing the same number of marbles. What is the largest number of marbles each bag can hold?
Which of these pairs are not coprime numbers?
Which of the following pairs are coprime numbers?
Two ropes are 126 meters and 154 meters long, respectively. What is the greatest length of rope that can be used to cut both ropes into smaller pieces of equal length without any remainder?
